landing.title: MNogiec | React developer
landing.description: As an ambitious and dedicated web developer, I would love to cooperate with you! Please feel free to visit this portfolio and check my work.
landing.keywords: react developer, portfolio, english, german, looking for work, work, cv, resume, polish, react, typescript, redux, gatsby, react native, javascript, html, css, sass, node.js, mongodb, mysql, python, git

cookie.text_end: to ensure you are getting the best possible experience.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Who am I?
about.title_text: If you want us to cooperate, it would be nice for you to know something about me. Just read this short summary below!
about.text: Hi! My name is Nicholas and I'm ambitous Web Developer based in Poland. I warmly think back to my childhood when I edited the first file containing code, just because I wanted to personalize a game server for me and my friends. Throughout the following years I've gained experience in multiple fields of programming. I can proudly say, that it's not only my way to make a living, but also my huge passion. Many projects that I have participated in needed direct communication with clients and managing a team just by myself. I hope we will have an opportunity to work together soon!

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.subtitle: I know and use
technologies.title_text: These are the most important and crucial technologies I use on a daily basis. Skills, programming languages, tools and more!

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: I'm proud of
projects.title_text: Here is a list of some of my projects, that I have recently done. They required different skills, which I acquired during my career.

matematykaDlaCiebie.title: Matematyka dla Ciebie
matematykaDlaCiebie.text: Designed and developer for a company specialized in teaching mathematics students. Includes hand-written shopping system, videos streaming platform and dedicated Content Management System.

unseal.title: Unseal
unseal.text: Web and mobile applications, designed and created for electronics' market in Poland. Contains authorial CMS to manage locks system in offices.

restauracjaStarka.title: Starka Restaurant
restauracjaStarka.text: Website created for a well-known restaurant in Cracow. Used a dedicated Wordpress theme hand-written from the ground up.

accademiaEnPlato.title: En-plato Accademia
accademiaEnPlato.text: Landing page designed and developer for Maestro Pizzaiolo's company training chefs in Poland. Includes vanilla Javascript algorithms to manage the website.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's talk!
contact.title_text: I believe communication is the key! Please feel free to use the form below to send me a message about any matter.
contact.thankText: I will reply as soon as possible.
